greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Period 5: Repeat [0, 1, 2, -2, -1].
comment: See the comments in A203571 concerning formulas of the n-th term of periodic sequences. - _M. F. Hasler_, Jan 13 2013
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-1,-1,-1,-1)
formula: a(n) = sum{k=0..5, L(k(k^2-n)/5)}/2, where L(j/p) is the Legendre symbol of j and p.
mathematica: Table[2 - Mod[2 - n, 5], {n, 0, 50}] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jul 12 2014 *)
program: (MAGMA) [2-((2-n) mod 5) : n in [0..50]]; // _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jul 12 2014
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 16 2006
ext: More terms from _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jul 12 2014
